subject: A IPSP Referent made a request about your project
1: For your information,  your project now has the status “pending review” for all the referents who made edit requests. They will be notified when you make edits.
4: Feel free to register your other projects, to circulate the information about IPSP, and to get in contact with other project managers!
5: Thank you for contributing to IPSP, a commons for research!
